name: aemi-light-syntax
readme:
# aemi
## light syntax theme

**aemi light syntax** is a minimalist light syntax theme for Atom. It is designed to be minimalist and aesthetic, with white background and vibrant colors.

**aemi light syntax** is also designed to be used with **[aemi light ui](https://github.com/originecode/aemi-light-ui "originecode:aemi-light-ui: Aesthetic Minimalist Light UI Theme")**, a minimalist white UI theme for Atom.

Notice : I personnaly use SF Mono as monospace font, but I recommend you [FiraCode](https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode "tonsky/FiraCode: Monospaced font with programming ligatures"), [Office Code Pro](https://github.com/nathco/Office-Code-Pro "nathco/Office-Code-Pro: Customized version of Source Code Pro") or [Hack](https://sourcefoundry.org/hack/ "Hack | A typeface designed for source code") font.
